Chap1s1.title: Chapter 1
Chap1s1.subtitle: Nothing can be taken for granted

dialogue.d1: Hey Azad, did you watch the news?
dialogue.d2: Billions of fake money discovered!!! It's 15% of our GDP!
dialogue.d3: Everyone will work on it during the next weeks! I have meetings all day, we'll talk tonight.
dialogue.d4: Hello Azad, a trusted person gave me your contact
dialogue.d5: I have some documents about a very sensitive case
dialogue.d7: I can't say more at the moment, I'll get back to you very soon

c2.choice1: No one could have imagined that

c4.choice1: Maybe! But first tell me more

dialogue.d1: Hey Azad, can you please buy some food? Rob is coming with Jessy after all...
dialogue.d2: What can I get you, sir ?
dialogue.d4: Your card has been declined, sir
dialogue.d5: It's still not working. Do you have any other means of payment?
dialogue.d6: I hope it's not fake money...
dialogue.d7: This counterfeit money story is terrible!
dialogue.d8: Since this morning, I'm afraid that every time a customer pays in cash at the restaurant, it might be fake bills...
dialogue.d9: Yeah, it's going to be a complete disaster for our country.
dialogue.d10: Apparently, there are several billion in circulation as we speak.

c1.choice1: No problem, I'm walking towards the Lebanese food truck you like.

c4.choice1: Let me try with the PIN.

c6.choice1: People might lose all confidence in our currency.
c6.choice2: I don't see how the government could solve the problem.

c7.choice1: Of all the times for my card to stop working, it had to choose now...
c7.choice2: I can't believe this is happening just when i'm having issues with my bank.

dialogue.d2: I contacted you last week about a touchy matter
dialogue.d3: Before I tell you, I need to make sure that our discussions remain private. The matter is extremely sensitive
dialogue.d4: At this stage, I can only give you its code name: ClearPath
dialogue.d5: Do not speak to anyone about our exchanges, I will never contact you anywhere other than on this encrypted app
dialogue.d6: There is a locker, number 29, at Central Street Station. The code is 091031. I have put a first sample of documents, you will realize the extent of the matter
dialogue.d7: It sounded urgent, is there a problem?
dialogue.d8: It costs nothing to see where it takes you

c1.choice1: Hi. Yes, I remember very well
c1.choice2: Hello ‚ÄúCincinnatus‚Äù, I still have no clue of what you're talking about

c2.choice1: I understand, can you at least tell me what it's about?

c3.choice1: What do you want me to do?

c5.choice1: Not really, but I have some doubts about a source who just contacted me.
c5.choice2: Someone contacted me, I don't know if I can trust him.

c6.choice1: ClearPath, does it mean anything to you?

c7.choice1: I'm not sure yet, I have to go.
c7.choice2: Never mind, I'll keep you posted.

Chap1s6.narration: Government announces the end of cash

dialogue.d1: This is insane. Are we in an Orwellian novel or what? They've banned cash!
dialogue.d2: Really? Who is he? An inside man?
dialogue.d3: Why would he take such a risk just before it goes public? That doesn't make sense...
dialogue.d4: Hi Azad, I assume you're following the news live
dialogue.d5: The situation has escalated. I didn't think they would move this quickly
dialogue.d6: You have no idea what we're about to reveal. This is only the tip of the iceberg...
dialogue.d7: Damn! Bad timing... Listen I'm willing to send you some money to assist you and keep up with the investigation
dialogue.d8: You have no idea what we're getting into. We need to see this through now
dialogue.d9: Let's just say money is not an issue, and I really need you to bring this story to light
dialogue.d10: You need to install a wallet
dialogue.d11: It's like your physical wallet, but digital. It's not managed by a bank or central authority, and no one can stop you from using it. It's digital cash.
dialogue.d12: I have to go now. Just install TronLink and send me your address and I'll send you money

c1.choice1: Remember the source I mentioned yesterday? He knew about it.

c2.choice1: I don't know yet. He sent me classified documents I collected last night.
c2.choice2: He sent me classified documents about the ClearPath operation.

c3.choice1: You're right. I need to find out.
c3.choice2: I need to get in touch with my source.

c4.choice2: Yes, we're in front of the TV

c5.choice1: I had a hard time believing it when I was going through the documents yesterday

c6.choice1: Do you know something else? My credit card is blocked so it's a terrible situation for me
c6.choice2: The ironic part of this story is that my card doesn't work anymore

dialogue.d1: Your source is probably right. If you want to follow through with this investigation, you need funds. Your account being frozen for ‚Äúsuspicious activity‚Äú is likely an attempt to intimidate you.
dialogue.d3: Anyway, you also need money for living, you can't keep borrowing money from colleagues like you've been doing for a week.
dialogue.d4: Remember the SBFTX investigation earlier this year? I learnt a lot from it... a wallet is not a bad idea to solve your problem, especially if it allows you to receive money.
dialogue.d5: Actually, it's quite simple. It's like a digital safe, or digital mailbox if you prefer, where anyone can deposit money, but no one can open it except for you.
dialogue.d6: And most importantly, no one can ever stop you from accessing it. Never.
dialogue.d7: Real money, you mean the one in your bank account that you can no longer use since they froze it?
dialogue.d8: Even if they are digital currencies, they are real, many stores accept cryptocurrencies.
dialogue.d9: Okay, first you need to install a digital wallet like Tron Wallet.
dialogue.d10: About 30 million of people use it, plus it's just a browser extension.
dialogue.d11: I'll guide you, we'll do it together.
dialogue.d12: So when TronLink will be added to your browser a new tab will open and ask you to create a new wallet
dialogue.d13: First you will have to set up a password to access the extension on your device.
dialogue.d14: Then, comes the most important step. TronLink will generate randomly 12 words. This is what we call the master key.
dialogue.d15: This is the only key to open your mailbox if we come back to the previous metaphor.
dialogue.d16: If you lose it, your wallet will be locked forever.
dialogue.d17: And if someone can access these words, he will have access to everything that is stored inside.
dialogue.d18: That's why keeping those 12 words in a safe place is essential.
dialogue.d19: Come back to me once you have completed all the steps I just described to you.

c1.choice1: What are you saying? I haven't started anything.
c1.choice2: Please don't be paranoid, it doesn't help...

c2.choice1: You're right! And with the new events, my issue will not be the priority of the bank.
c2.choice2: I should have fixed the problem last week.

c3.choice1: I didn't get this digital wallet thing...
c3.choice2: Is it related to Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies?

c4.choice1: But it's still ‚Äúvirtual‚Äú money compared to real LIS money.

c5.choice1: That's what Cincinnatus told me to install.

c7.choice1: What happens if I lose it?

c9.choice2: It gave me hard time but I finally made it

dialogue.d1: Hey Azad, did you install a wallet?
dialogue.d2: Alright, I will send you some funds now, in USDD currency. It's what we call a stablecoin, its value is pegged to dollars (1USDD = $1)
dialogue.d3: I need your address to send you the funds now. It is the unique sequence of letters and numbers that starts with T‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
dialogue.d4: Once you clicked on the wallet extension you'll find it written just below ‚ÄúWallet >‚Äú
dialogue.d5: Just click on it to copy your address in the clipboard and paste it here
dialogue.d6: In order to do transactions on this network, you will also need some ‚Äúgas‚Äù. It's like the gasoline for your car, if you want to run it, you'll need to fill the tank with the appropriate fuel
dialogue.d7: Basically this ‚Äúgas‚Äù is a specific currency, used to paid your own transactions. On this network this currency is called TRX
dialogue.d8: But when you use your bankcard you pay a fee too! The difference is just that you don't care about it because the merchant pays it for you!
dialogue.d9: Sorry I need to go, I'll contact you very soon

c1.choice2: I installed TronLink as you said

c2.choice1: You mean it's required to pay for each transaction?

dialogue.d1: Hi, it will be 4000$ for the bail of M. Doe
dialogue.d2: How do you want to pay?
dialogue.d3: Please read and accept the transaction
